text: Hur it with go charges Hur it back sure
isn't dead we nearly emptied our entire
Arsenal on the last one stay ready
Captain we need backup in a bad way ammo
is low getting lower by the second Coast
Guard Navy everywhere near us are
getting distress calls from civilians
they need assistance and Evac they will
Aid us when they can but unarmed
civilians take priority Marines you got
me copy that okay give me Citra how we
hold negative it got a few of us
Richardson Smith and Jacobs by my count
and the port side pretty bad too can'ta
until we find sore sir that was the last
one of our dead charges but it looked
like it did the trick at least for now
sir well hopefully it'll be enough to
the nothing thing twice about coming
back for us that sucker was even bigger
than the last one was like what 200 ft
ship is 600 ft damn thing was easily a
third of the size well the smaller one
killed most of us I'm going to try to
send out another SOS I need the two of
you to keep your eyes glued on that damn
water you so much as a glimpse that damn
thing you let everybody know clear yes
sir cuz if it decides to come back and
we're not ready we are all dead pal go
oh
